com.burstly.lib.component
Interface IAdaptorController

All Known Implementing Classes:
BurstlyAdaptorController, NetworkAwareControllerWrapper
public interface IAdaptorController

Interface describes adaptor controller. Controller is responsible for managing IBurstlyAdaptor instance.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

Nested Class Summary

isPrefetchRequest

boolean isPrefetchRequest()
If true than this component was prefetched.

Returns:
true if current component was prefetched

setPrefetchedRequest

void setPrefetchedRequest(boolean isPrefetched)
Set to true if this component was prefetched. This means that no standard lifecycle should be invoked. Component will be created but won't be shown until next request for ad.

Parameters:
isPrefetched - true is this component was prefetched

showPrecachedAd

void showPrecachedAd()
This method shows ad after previous prefetch request.
